column1: Little Goat Diner////Id highly recommend making a reservation
column2: because even the counter space filled up quickly. I couldn't decide what to order (shocking)
column3: so I went with the special. I can't remember what it was called
column4: but it was essentially a Cobb salad on top of two pieces of avocado toast with fried egg and fried chicken. I also had coffee and a mimosa.
